targets.expr: sum by (node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on (node) group_left sum by (node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval]))

topk(5, sum by(namespace, pod) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!=""}[5m])) / on (namespace, pod) group_left sum by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu"}))
topk(5, sum by (namespace, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""}) / on (namespace, pod) group_left sum by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory"}))
